name: MIS Ethnic Monitoring Incentives Report
description:
Gives the breakdown of prisoner incentive levels (Basic, Standard or Enhanced) by ethnic origin code within a prison establishment.
FIN0011 - v00.01.03 Last Modified: 03/09/12

dataset.name: Crosstab
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END AS ETHNIC_CODE, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **') AS IEP_BAND, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, COUNT(DISTINCT (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AS COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Area (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Area',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:68) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Area (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Area',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:68) */)) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */)) AND NOT COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **') IS NULL) GROUP BY CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **'), AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK), dataset_ AS (SELECT ETHNIC_CODE, IEP_BAND, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AREA_DESCRIPTION, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, TO_CHAR(COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, 'fm990.00') AS V_PERCENTAGE_OF_OFFENDERS, AREA_DESCRIPTION || ' Area Totals:' AS V_AREA_BREAK_TOTAL_TITLE, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION || ' Totals:' AS V_ESTABLISHMENT_BREAK_TOTAL_33 FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Ethnic Code
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END AS PHYSICAL_DETAILS_ETHNIC_CODE, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'White: Gypsy or Irish Traveller' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'Asian/Asian British: Chinese' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.DESCRIPTION END AS ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES), dataset_ AS (SELECT PHYSICAL_DETAILS_ETHNIC_CODE, ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION, TO_CHAR(COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, 'fm990.00') AS V_PERCENTAGE_OF_OFFENDERS, AREA_DESCRIPTION || ' Area Totals:' AS V_AREA_BREAK_TOTAL_TITLE, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION || ' Totals:' AS V_ESTABLISHMENT_BREAK_TOTAL_33 FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION NOT(IN ('Not Applicable','Not Valid','Unknown')))

errors.error: dataset::resolveCTEs parse error for : $ref:V_PERCENTAGE_OF_OFFENDERS :: ReferenceError: error is not defined
dataset::injectCalculations parse error for : $ref:V_PERCENTAGE_OF_OFFENDERS :: ReferenceError: error is not defined
instance.report[0].specification.template is not one of enum values: list,list-section,list-tab,summary,summary-section,parent-child,parent-child-section
Report field PHYSICAL_DETAILS_ETHNIC_CODE does not have corresponding dataset schema field
